CustomField.description:
Holds the number of days from today (calculating backwards) for the Organisation Revenue Calculation window (specified by OrgRevCalcWindow) should start. For example, if the OrgRevCalcWindowOffset is set to 7 and OrgRevCalcWindow is set to 10, then the window will be from (today-7) to (today-17).
This should be set to zero for normal weekly batch runs.
CustomField.label: OrgRevCalcWindowOffset
